title: Looking For Mid Laner
body:
Looking for a mid laner for tournies and general ranked play.
Must be  smart enough to give and receive constructive criticism, learn from your own mistakes and be able to stay positive throughout games.

The first tournament we will be competing in will be on the 21st -22nd so you will have to make sure you will be available that day

replies.body:
I'd love to be your mid :), as my name suggests I main katarina although I also play lissandra, syndra, lulu, annie, fizz, jhin, corki, zed and oiranna. Im free on both those days and have been looking for a team for a while! 

Looking forward to seeing you on the rift.

Ign: Katlife

Add me 
IGN: The Gingninj69
I main mid and would love to fill in
Mains: Zed, Azir, Ekko, Yasuo and Talon
